summary: Change the sneak bonus value of all kinds of weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]At first i made this mod for my personal use only [/size][i][size=2][s](because i'm a gentleman who like stabbing people at the back, got problem?)[/s][/size][/i][size=3], but now i'll share it with you folks.

Bow: 15x
Crossbow: 15x
Dagger: 15x
One-handed Axe: 10x
One-handed Sword: 10x
Mace: 5x (i mean, c'mon, mace isn't the best weapon to bring with you when you are sneaking. But if you insist, just leave a comment, or you can modify it yourself, lol.)
Two-handed Sword: 8x (Yeah, it's a brilliant idea to bring a bigass greatsword with you when you are sneaking. I mean, who give a damn right?)
Two-handed Axe: 8x (Same as above...)[/size]

[b][u][color=#ff0000][size=4]If this mod isn't exactly your type of thing. Just ignore it, i don't want to hear: bla-bla-bla it isn't this or it is so that,...
[/size][/color][/u][/b][color=#ff0000][size=4][b][u]And why is this mod makes everything so overpowered? Can you survive when you take an arrow to the face or a dagger to your neck?Â 

[/u][/b][/size][/color][size=5]Feel free to tweak my mod to however you like, lol =D[/size]
author: BondRimplace
